description:
Does your slow/slowing phone annoy you and slow you down?

Not getting the work done that you should?

If this is the case for you, then with some simple steps you can really transform your Android experience - and since you're on your phone every day you may as well get it working as fast as you can.

There is nothing worse than having a phone that delays, lags, freezes and fails.

So in this course I'm going to take you through a whole range of things (ALL REALLY SIMPLE) you can do to make your phone snappier than ever.

It'll be WELL worth the time :)
title: Android Tricks: Instantly Speed Up Your Android Device
